LanguageData.SadjuukBedAA.label: Wood Logs bed
LanguageData.SadjuukBedAA.description: Beauty : 0 Comfort : 60% Immunity : +0% Surgery : -30% Tending : +0% A simple wooden support to sleep on. It is found among the most primitive peoples and in the most infamous prisons.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomAB.label: Double Logs bed
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomAB.description: Beauty : 0 Comfort : 60% Immunity : +0% Surgery : -30% Tending : +0% A simple wooden support to sleep on. It is found among the most primitive peoples and in the most infamous prisons.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomBA.label: Wooden Bed
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomBA.description: Beauty : 4 Comfort : 85% Immunity : +5% Surgery : +0% Tending : +0% A comfortable bed made of wood giving a soft atmosphere to a room.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomBB.label: Double Wooden Bed
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomBB.description: Beauty : 4 Comfort : 85% Immunity : +5% Surgery : +0% Tending : +0% A comfortable bed made of wood giving a soft atmosphere to a room.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomCA.label: Steel Bed
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomCA.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : 75% Immunity : +8% Surgery : +0% Tending : +0% A standard steel bed. Perfect for barracks, it also offers good hygiene properties.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomCB.label: Double Steel Bed
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomCB.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : 75% Immunity : +8% Surgery : +0% Tending : +0% A standard steel bed. Perfect for barracks, it also offers good hygiene properties.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeAA.label: Wooden Chest
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeAA.description: Beauty : 0 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : A personal wooden chest. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeAB.label: Wooden Storage
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeAB.description: Beauty : 0 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : Although made of simple wood, this piece of furniture at least allows you to store your personal belongings.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeAC.label: Small Log Table
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeAC.description: Beauty : 0 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : A small primitive table.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeAF.label: Wood Logs Armchair
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeAF.description: Beauty : 0 Comfort : +2% Comfort : 70% Bedroom Upgrade : A rigid wooden seat but still comfortable.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeBA.label: Wooden Nightstand
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeBA.description: Beauty : 4 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : A beautiful wooden Nightstand. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeBB.label: Wooden Wardrobe
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeBB.description: Beauty : 4 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : A large wooden wardrobe.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeBC.label: Small Wooden Table
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeBC.description: Beauty : 12 Comfort : +4% Bedroom Upgrade : A finely decorated bedroom table.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeBF.label: Wooden Armchair
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeBF.description: Beauty : 6 Comfort : +4% Comfort : 80% Bedroom Upgrade : A finely decorated seat.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCA.label: Steel Chest
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCA.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : A personal steel chest, essential in the development of a civilian or military dormitory. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCB.label: Steel Lockers
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCB.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : Steel Lockers allowing a certain privacy.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCC.label: Small Steel Table
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCC.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : A standard steel table.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCD.label: Small Glass Table
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCD.description: Beauty : 6 Comfort : +2% Bedroom Upgrade : A small glass table making nearby beds a little bit more comfortable.
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCF.label: Office Chair
LanguageData.SadjuukBedroomUpgradeCF.description: Beauty : 2 Comfort : +2% Comfort : 75% Bedroom Upgrade : A complex but comfortable manufacturing armchair.
